description: Create components/nav-tabs.tsx with vertical navigation: Files, Database, Cron, Logs, System. Use icons from lucide-react (FolderOpen, Database, Clock, ScrollText, Activity). Highlight active tab. Update sidebar.tsx to include NavTabs above the file tree. Add activeTab state to main page, pass to sidebar.

Update lib/files.ts getFileTree to include all files (remove .md filter). Update api/files to return all files. Create components/code-viewer.tsx that uses highlight.js to render code with syntax highlighting. Detect language from file extension. In page.tsx, render CodeViewer for non-.md files, MarkdownViewer for .md files.

Install better-sqlite3 (npm i better-sqlite3 @types/better-sqlite3). Create lib/database.ts with functions: getTables() returns table names, getTableSchema(table) returns columns, getTableRows(table, limit, offset) returns rows with count.

Create app/api/database/route.ts - GET returns {tables: [{name, rowCount}]}. Create app/api/database/[table]/route.ts - GET with ?limit=50&offset=0 returns {rows, total, columns}. Validate table name to prevent injection.

Create components/database-viewer.tsx. Fetch /api/database on mount to get tables. Show table tabs. When table selected, fetch rows from /api/database/[table]. Display as HTML table with proper styling. Add pagination (prev/next buttons, showing X-Y of Z).

Create app/api/cron/route.ts - GET runs 'clawdbot cron list --json' via child_process.exec, returns parsed jobs array. Create app/api/cron/[id]/toggle/route.ts - POST runs 'clawdbot cron disable [id]' or 'enable [id]'. Create app/api/cron/[id]/run/route.ts - POST runs 'clawdbot cron run [id]'.

Create components/cron-viewer.tsx. Fetch /api/cron on mount. Display table with columns: name, schedule, last run (relative time), status (badge), enabled (toggle switch), actions (Run Now button). Refresh every 30s. Handle toggle and run actions with loading states.

Create app/api/logs/route.ts as Server-Sent Events endpoint. Use child_process.spawn to run 'tail -f ~/.clawdbot/logs/gateway.log'. Pipe stdout lines as SSE 'data:' events. Handle connection close to kill the tail process.

Create components/logs-viewer.tsx. Connect to /api/logs using EventSource. Display logs in a pre/code block with monospace font, dark bg, green text (terminal style). Auto-scroll to bottom. Add Pause/Resume button (disconnects/reconnects SSE). Show last 100 lines max (trim older).

Create app/api/system/route.ts - GET returns {cpu: percent, ram: {used, total, percent}, disk: {used, total, percent}, uptime: seconds}. Use Node os module for RAM. Run 'df -h /' for disk. Run 'top -bn1' or /proc/stat for CPU. Run 'uptime -s' for uptime.

Create components/system-stats.tsx. Fetch /api/system on mount and every 5s. Display three progress bars (use shadcn Progress component) for CPU, RAM, Disk. Show labels with values. Show server uptime formatted nicely (e.g., '5 days, 3 hours').

Update app/page.tsx to render different components based on activeTab: 'files' shows file tree + viewer, 'database' shows DatabaseViewer, 'cron' shows CronViewer, 'logs' shows LogsViewer, 'system' shows SystemStats. Ensure all sections work and look consistent.
